name: Vue-picture-cut
tagline: Image clipping tool based on Vue and Typescript. Feature：Scale, flip, rotate, edge check, rectangle clip, ellipse clip.   基于vue和typescript的图片剪裁工具。功能：缩放、翻折、旋转、边缘校验、矩形剪裁、任意(椭)圆剪裁
body: # vue-picture-cut 2.x ![npm](https://badgen.net/npm/v/vue-picture-cut?cache=1800) ![download](https://badgen.net/npm/dm/vue-picture-cut?cache=1800) ![license](https://badgen.net/npm/license/vue-picture-cut) 基于`vue`和`typescript`开发的一款图片剪裁处理工具 优点：**原生、轻量、使用简单、功能全面、扩展性强** 目前功能：**缩放、翻折、旋转、边缘校验、矩形剪裁、任意(椭)圆剪裁** 关于缩放：鼠标（鼠标滚轮缩放）、触屏（双指缩放） An image clipping tool based on `vue` and `typescript`. Advantage：**It is original, light weight, simple to use, comprehensive function and strong expansibility** Feature：**Scale, flip, rotate, edge check, rectangle clip, ellipse clip** About zoom: mouse (mouse wheel zoom), touch screen (double finger zoom) github 码云 demo(github) demo(码云) 💩💩💩0.x版本点这里【此版本bug太多，不再维护】 [![NPM](https://nodei.co/npm/vue-picture-cut.png)](https://nodei.co/npm/vue-picture-cut/) VuePictureCut 💗 you!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
